item.description: It's my birthday and we don't have to work tomorrow. What could be better fresh oysters and beer? The Red House is a smaller restaurant between Charlie's Beer Garden and Tommy Doyles on Winthrop Street in Harvard Square. I will get there early so just come by when you've finished work. I will be there until 6Pm (oyster Bar 3 - 6PM), then walk toÂ  The Field Irish Pub in Central Sq. (7Pm - ??) see Part 2.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at the outdoor oyster bar
item.name: 2 Oysters for $1- Happy Birthday Bash, Part 1
